function ContributionsTable({ contributions, summary }) { return (
{contributions && contributions.contributors && (

Campaign finance information for the {contributions.cycle} election cycle:

Cash on Hand Raised This Cycle Total Debt Spent this Cycle Next Election Last Updated
{summary.cashOnHand} {summary.total} {summary.debt} {summary.spent} {summary.nextElection} {summary.lastUpdated}
{contributions.contributors.map((contributor, index) => ( ))}
Contributor Amount
{contributor['@attributes'].org_name} {new Intl.NumberFormat('en-US', { style: 'currency', currency: 'USD', minimumFractionDigits: 0, }).format(contributor['@attributes'].total)}
)}
); } export default ContributionsTable;
